summary: Project involves creating a clear resin headstone mold design for Ponce, featuring flowers, grass, and a male Yorkie picture inside a black square frame.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Clear transparent resin headstone mold shape with colorful flowers (roses, daisies) and green grass blades embedded inside the resin, centered with a male Yorkshire Terrier (Yorkie) dog portrait inside a solid black square frame on the face of the headstone, photorealistic resin craft style (ponce-headstone-mold.dim_800x900.png)

existing_features.title: Generate a new headstone mold product image showing a clear resin headstone shape with flowers and green grass elements embedded inside, and a male Yorkie dog portrait displayed inside a black square frame centered on the headstone. This image should replace or be used as the Headstone shape showcase image in ShapeShowcases.tsx.
Update the Headstone shape card in ShapeShowcases.tsx to render the newly generated clear resin headstone mold image (ponce-headstone-mold.dim_800x900.png) as its showcase photo.

new_feature_requests.summary: Clear resin headstone mold with flowers, grass, and a male Yorkie picture inside a black square frame for Ponce's headstone
